original_title: Human Rights Guidelines for Sri Lanka officials
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Human Rights Commission of Sri Lanka launched three guidelines and recommendations to state and other authorities on Human Rights.

The Human Rights Commission of Sri Lanka announced new guidelines and recommendations to state authorities in Colombo at an event titled 'Freedom, Equality and Justice for all’ in commemoration of International Human Rights Day.
‘General Guidelines and Recommendations to the Sri Lanka Police on Prevention of Custodial and Encounter deaths’
'General Guidelines and Recommendations on the Protection of Human Rights Defenders’ and
‘Interim Report of the Fact Finding Mission on Right to Health and Liberty of the Patients at the National Institute of Mental Health'
The Acting Inspector General of Police, other police officers, and state officials were present for the land of these guidelines and recommendations.
